item.description:
Cinema City is doing a series of classic movies on Sundays at 11:00am. I am going to schedule meetups for all of them even if I cannot attend, to let people know about them.

Although this is more recent than most of the other movies in the series, "The Princess Bride" quickly became a classic. Who cannot quote Inigo Montoya's introduction? You do know what an R.O.O.U.S. is, don't you? Would you like to own a Dread Pirate Roberts franchise?

group.name: Beyond the Multiplex: Hartford's Indie and Foreign Film fans

item.name: "The Princess Bride" - Cine Classics at Cinema City at the Palace
